body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps               Theodore Roosevelt Island Download a map of trails, restrooms, and water fountains on Theodore Roosevelt Island           Mount Vernon Trail Download a map of the Mount Vernon Trail, which begins at Mount Vernon and ends at Theodore Roosevelt Island. This map shows connections to other regional trails.      Potomac Heritage Trail Download a map of the Potomac Heritage Trail , which begins at Theodore Roosevelt Island. This map shows a section of the trail from the island to the American Legion Bridge. For a map of the whole trail, visit the Potomac Heritage Trail website.
title: Theodore Roosevelt Island: Maps
